hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Hurayrah: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: 'By the One in whose hand is my soul, soon Jesus son of Mary will descend among you as a just judge and just leader. He will break the cross, kill the pig, and abolish the jizya. Wealth will overflow until no one accepts it.'

narrators.full_name: Hafs ibn Umar ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Awf

narrators.name: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Hurayrah: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: 'How will you be when the son of Mary descends among you as a judge, leading you? Or he said: as your leader from among you?'

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Hurayrah: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: 'By the One in whose hand is my soul, surely Jesus son of Mary will descend at the mountain pass of al-Rawha as a pilgrim performing hajj or umrah, or he will perform both.'

narrators.name: Miqdam ibn Mu'addi Karib

narrators.full_name: Muhammad ibn Abdullah ibn Abd al-Muttalib ibn Hashim

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Tawus from his father: Jesus son of Mary will descend as a fair judge and just arbitrator. When he descends, he will break the cross, kill the pig, abolish the jizya, and the religion will be one. He will establish order on earth such that the lion will be with the cow as if the cow were its mother, and the wolf with the sheep as if it were its dog, and the venom of every venomous creature will be removed such that a man will place his hand on the head of a snake and it will not harm him, and a girl will flee from a lion as she would flee from a small dog's offspring.

narrators.name: Ibn Tawus
narrators.full_name: Abdullah ibn Tawus ibn Kaysan al-Yamami

chainIssues: This is a maqtu' hadith (cut/stopped chain) as it ends at Tawus without reaching a companion or the Prophet

potential_issues.issue: Chain is maqtu' (stopped)
potential_issues.impact: Hadith does not reach a companion or the Prophet ﷺ, which affects its authenticity grade

potential_issues.issue: Incomplete chain structure
potential_issues.impact: The actual source or authority being cited is not clearly identified in the chain

hadiths.IISGrade: Disconnections But All Narrators Are Ok
Topics: Descent of Jesus son of Mary
Abolition of the cross and the jizya
Peace in the End Times
Animals becoming harmless
Description of peaceful era with Jesus ﷺ

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Hurayrah: The Hour will not be established until Jesus son of Mary descends as a fair judge, and Quraysh will lose the jizyah, and he will kill the pig, break the cross, and the prayer will be one for the Lord of the Worlds. The weapons of war will be laid down, and the earth will be filled with Islam as it is filled with water, and the earth will be like a golden tray full of herbage, and hatred and enmity will be removed, and the wolf will be with the sheep as if it were its dog.

narrators.name: Abu Salamah
narrators.full_name: Abd Allah ibn Abd al-Rahman ibn Awf al-Ahmasi
narrators.alternative_names: Abu Salamah al-Hmasi, Abu Salamah al-Harani

narrators.name: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ
narrators.full_name: Muhammad ibn Abdullah ibn Abd al-Muttalib ibn Hashim

chainIssues: Unknown narrator appears in the chain as an intermediary
Habib ibn Marzoq and Abu Salamah are rated as Saduq (acceptable but with some issues)
Use of عَنْ (from) instead of more direct transmission terms at certain points

potential_issues.issue: Unknown/unidentified narrator in chain
potential_issues.impact: Critical issue - narrators must be identifiable. This creates a serious disconnection problem in the chain

potential_issues.issue: Habib ibn Marzoq and Abu Salamah are Saduq
potential_issues.impact: Acceptable but have reliability concerns

potential_issues.issue: Use of عَنْ with Abu Hurayrah
potential_issues.impact: While not problematic if from a reliable narrator, the presence of the unknown narrator is the main concern

Topics: Descent of Jesus son of Mary
Signs of the Hour and End Times
Breaking the cross and killing the pig
Abolition of the jizya
Peace and harmony among creatures
Islam filling the earth

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Abu Hurayrah: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: Verily, the Prophets are brothers from the same father but different mothers, and their religion is one. The most closely related to me among them is Jesus son of Mary, for there is no Prophet between me and him. He will descend among you, so recognize him! He is a man of average build, inclined towards whiteness and redness. He kills the pig, breaks the cross, and abolishes the jizya, and he will not accept anything besides Islam. The prayer will be one for the Lord of the Worlds, and tyranny will be destroyed.

narrators.full_name: 'Uqbah ibn Makram ibn Aflah ibn Jarad

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Yazid al-Asamm: I heard Abu Hurayrah saying: 'You will see me as an old man, my collarbones almost meeting due to old age, and by Allah, I hope to meet Jesus (Isa), and to narrate to him what the Messenger of Allah ﷺ said.'

narrators.full_name: Yazid ibn Abi Habib al-Asamm al-Masri

Topics: Prophet Muhammad ﷺ expressing hope to meet Jesus
Expectation of Jesus's descent
Old age of Prophet Muhammad ﷺ

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Anas: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said: 'The Hour will not be established as long as there is someone saying Allah, Allah (there is no god but Allah).'

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Ali: The most evil of people, or among the most evil of people, are those whom the Hour overtakes while they are alive, and those who hasten to testify falsely before being asked, and those who take graves as places of prayer.

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Salman: On the Day of Judgment, the sun will come close to the heads of people at a distance of a bow's length, or two bows' lengths. They will be given the heat of ten years, and no flesh of people will remain unburned. There will be no curtain (or covering) between the people and the Fire.

Topics: Signs of the Hour - the sun on the Day of Judgment
Heat and punishment on the Day of Judgment
Proximity of the sun to people
Burning of flesh
